definition: materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

pinyin: bian4 zheng4 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4
li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: Relationalism is the essence of practical materialism and Piagets theory.
sentences.chinese: 關係論是實踐唯物主義和皮亞傑學說的精華。

sentences.english: The three leaps in materialist view of interests give rise to the three improvements of development view.
sentences.chinese: 唯物主義利益觀的三次飛躍促成了發展觀的三次提升。

sentences.english: The dialectical materialism philosophic thought is generally implied in theory and practice of accounting.
sentences.chinese: 會計理論和實踐中普遍滲透着辨證唯物主義哲學思想。

sentences.english: Gerald was nettled by this implication of vulgar materialism.
sentences.chinese: 傑拉德被她話語中流露出的庸俗唯物主義惹惱了。

sentences.english: It is obviously also the materialist, or, social position.
sentences.chinese: 這明顯也是唯物主義的，社會層面的觀點。

sentences.english: There are two kinds of comprehensions—idealism and contemplative materialism—in the history.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上出現了唯心主義和直觀唯物主義兩種理解方式。

sentences.english: Hence, it is a sub-branch of emergent materialism.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它是湧現唯物主義的子分支。

sentences.english: Dialectical natural space-time notion is a modern materialistic scientific space-time notion.
sentences.chinese: 辯證的自然時空觀是現代唯物主義的科學時空觀。

sentences.english: I’ve shoved away materialism, replacing it with experiences.
sentences.chinese: 我已經用經驗代替了唯物主義。

sentences.english: We are learning the Marxist philosophy of dialectical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在學習馬克思主義辨證唯物主義哲學。

sentences.english: No longer is materialism and dreaming at loggerheads.
sentences.chinese: 唯物主義與夢也已不再對立。

sentences.english: This is a heated debate which involves materialist as opposed to idealist views.
sentences.chinese: 這是一場唯物主義與唯心主義的大論戰。

sentences.english: He made pretensions to literature and to materialism.
sentences.chinese: 他自以爲愛好文學和唯物主義。

sentences.english: But Kyte gave me the most materialistic lessons.
sentences.chinese: 但是肚皮給了我最唯物主義的教育。

sentences.english: He criticised too the emptiness of secular materialism.
sentences.chinese: 而世俗唯物主義的虛無也是他的抨擊目標。

definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
lit. to build a cart behind closed doors/to be overly subjective and disregard the outside world (idiom)
to choose what is good and hold fast to it (idiom)
